name: This is a Black Parallelepipedon in a Yellow Field
summary:
The enigma of the fields. Unknow a shape.

Consider the idea of a black storehouse in a yellow field. Charred walls. Painted walls. Walls smudged in black ash.
Maybe consider an unreal crop.
Or consider, observe, establish, evaluate an above-ground pool. Which would be an odd find, right here in the middle of a field, but then again, that structure in the middle distance has got to be something...

An absurd, alienating game developed as part of the Briefs series, a gold extra project with additional support by Strange Scaffold.
